mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, user_pass, user_gender, user_birth , user_phone, user_email, user_profile) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pass}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth} ,#{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_profile})
mapper.select: select * from user_info order by user_date desc limit #{startRecord}, #{recordPage}
